cont.entity_a: Razor sharp at F1.8. Very sharp from f1.8, very sharp and quick autofocus, extremely accurate colors and tack sharp, stunning images, incredibly bright, clear images, sharp and fast, perfect for low light photography.
cont.entity_b: Sharp wide open with eye autofocus on Sony A7III.

cont.entity_a: Brilliant color, typical Zeiss colors and microcontrast, extremely accurate colors, brighter colors, crisper, and sharper than other Sony lenses.
Gorgeously round bokeh, bokeh balls from background lights are beautiful, images are rendered beautifully with amazing bokeh at f/1.8.
Heavy, not a 'walk around' lens, stunning images with a somewhat heavy lens, heavy lens, best used on a tripod.
Ideal for studio headshots, perfect for portrait work and astrophotography.
cont.entity_b: Phenomenal results in low light with new Sony video cameras, takes amazing pictures with f2.8 and 2.0 TC.

cont.entity_a: Super-sharp with built-in camera stabilization for handheld use in low light, sharp and fast, perfect for low light photography with built-in sensor stabilization.
Highly recommended to use with Hoya 77mm HD3 UV Filter for protection.
Not a speed king in focus speed.
cont.entity_b: Slightly faster AF compared to E-Mount 70-200GM F/2.8, SSM is quiet and fast.

cont.entity_a: Well built and comfortable in hands.
cont.entity_b: Exceptional build and image quality justifies the price.

cont.entity_a: High price tag but worth the quality.
cont.entity_b: Worth its price for high-end cameras, especially full-frame.
Intermittent 2-4EV overexposure, but replacement works perfectly.
